channel.title: Need help with npcs
channel.description:
hi every1 i use project corrupted base.I don't wanana to leach it :D ;D
here is problem when i edited npc drops and when i am trying to run server this happens Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 45 at NPCHandler.loadNPCDrops(NPCHandler.java:2168) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:548) at server.main(server.java:111) Project Corrupted
can any1 pls tell me where is my mistake ???
i tabbed everything right when i open npc handler for abyys i find this if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2263) { // abyssal leach rand_npc = misc.random(5);
so pls can any1 tell me what do i have to do ????? every1 tyvm :D :D :D :D

item.title: Need help with npcs
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Make sure you didn’t use spaces instead of tabs again.

Read full topic
